contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Acestrorhynchus'' | image = Acestrorhynchus.jpg | image_caption = ''Acestrorhynchus '' sp. | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordata]] | classis = [[Actinopterygii]] | ordo = [[Characiformes]] | superfamilia = [[Cynodontoidea]] | familia = '''Acestrorhynchidae''' | familia_authority = [[Carl H. Eigenmann|C. H. Eigenmann]], 1912 | genus = '''''Acestrorhynchus''''' | genus_authority = [[Carl H. Eigenmann|C. H. Eigenmann]] & [[Clarence Hamilton Kennedy|C. H. Kennedy]], 1903 | subdivision_ranks = [[Species]] | subdivision = See text }} '''''Acestrorhynchus''''' ("needle jaw" ) is a [[genus]] of 14 species of [[Characiformes|characiform]] [[fish]] found only in freshwater in [[South America]], the sole genus in the family '''Acestrorhynchidae'''. Their greatest diversity is in the [[Orinoco]] and [[Amazon basin]]s. These fish have elongate [[Esox|pike]]-like bodies and large conical teeth, adapted for predation on other types of fish. They are sometimes referred to as [[freshwater barracuda]] in the [[aquarium]] trade, although the name is used of other characins as well. They range from 35 to 400 mm in length. Common names are Cachorinho, Cachorro, Mopiye, Payala, Pejezorro, Pez cachorro, Pez zorro, Pike Characin, Moinge, Halatawéi, Halataway, Dagu fisi, Ueua, Wayabra, Zadoe, Freshwater Barracuda, saicanga, branca, cajaba, cachorra magra, cadelinha and dentudo. == Species == * ''[[Acestrorhynchus abbreviatus]]'' <small>([[Edward Drinker Cope|Cope]], 1878)</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus altus]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]], 1969</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus britskii]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]], 1969</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus falcatus]]'' <small>([[Marcus Elieser Bloch|Bloch]], 1794)</small> (freshwater barracuda, spotted cachorro) * ''[[Acestrorhynchus falcirostris]]'' <small>([[Georges Cuvier|G. Cuvier]], 1819)</small> (slender freshwater barracuda, big-eyed cachorro) * ''[[Acestrorhynchus grandoculis]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]] & [[Jacques Géry|Géry]], 1983</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus heterolepis]]'' <small>([[Edward Drinker Cope|Cope]], 1878)</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus isalineae]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]] & [[Jacques Géry|Géry]], 1983</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus lacustris]]'' <small>([[Christian Frederik Lütken|Lütken]], 1875)</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus maculipinna]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]] & [[Jacques Géry|Géry]], 1983</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus microlepis]]'' <small>([[Sir William Jardine, 7th Baronet|Jardine]], 1841)</small> (Pike characin) * ''[[Acestrorhynchus minimus]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]], 1969</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus nasutus]]'' <small>[[Carl H. Eigenmann|C. H. Eigenmann]], 1912</small> * ''[[Acestrorhynchus pantaneiro]]'' <small>[[Naércio Aquino de Menezes|Menezes]], 1992</small> ==External links== * {{FishBase family | family = Acestrorhynchidae | year = 2011 | month = October}} * [http://www.mongabay.com/fish/acestrorhynchus.htm Aquarium info] [[Category:Acestrorhynchidae]] [[Category:Fish of South America]] {{Characiformes-stub}}
